A sequel to {{AMCM}}, tentatively referred to as '''Another Minecraft Movie'''<ref name="sequelname">{{citation|url=https://www.artofvfx.com/a-minecraft-movie-sheldon-stopsack-vfx-supervisor-kevin-estey-animation-supervisor-weta-fx/|title=A Minecraft Movie: Sheldon Stopsack (VFX Supervisor) & Kevin Estey (Animation Supervisor) ‚Äì Weta FX|section=What is your next project?|website=[https://www.artofvfx.com/ The Art of VFX]|author=Vincent Frei|date=May 12, 2025|quote=SS ‚Äì Unfortunately I am unable to disclose that information .. but I hope that there might be ‚ÄúAnother Minecraft Movie‚Äù somewhere down the line and we can all do this again.<br><br>KE ‚Äì Currently that‚Äôs something that I can‚Äôt disclose, but I CAN disclose that I‚Äôm ready for Another Minecraft Movie if we can be so fortunate to enjoy another journey into the weird and wonderful world.|archive-url=}}</ref> and '''A Minecraft Movie 2''',{{fn|The film's title is not officially announced. However, media outlets have so far referred to the sequel as '''A Minecraft Movie 2''' or '''Minecraft 2'''.<ref name="AMCM2"/><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/a-minecraft-movie-2-announced-coming-july-2027/1100-6535348/|title=A Minecraft Movie 2 Announced, Coming July 2027 Just After Zelda Movie|website=GameSpot|author=Eddie Makuch|date=October 9, 2025}}</ref>}} is an upcoming film based on the video game ''[[Minecraft]]''. The film is set to be directed by [[Jared Hess]] and written by Hess and {{w|Chris Galletta}}, and is slated to be released on July 23, 2027, by [[Warner Bros. Pictures]].<ref name="AMCM2">{{Citation|url=https://deadline.com/2025/10/minecraft-2-release-date-1236574896|title='Minecraft 2' Is Happening With Director Jared Hess Returning; Summer 2027 Release Set|website=Deadline Hollywood|date=October 9, 2025}}</ref>

Plans for the film originated around April 11, 2025 following the success of ''A Minecraft Movie'' when it was reported by several outlets that a sequel was already in early development.<ref>{{citation|url=https://gamefragger.com/multiplatform/massively-multiplayer/minecraft/a-minecraft-movie-sequel-already-in-talks-after-record-breaking-box-office-opening-a27168|title=A MINECRAFT MOVIE Sequel Already In Talks After Record-Breaking Box Office Opening|website=Game Fragger|date=April 13, 2025}}</ref><ref name=":Comic">{{citation|url=https://comicbook.com/gaming/news/a-minecraft-movie-sequel-is-being-made/|title=A Minecraft Movie Sequel Is Reportedly Already In The Works|website=Comicbook.com|date=April 13, 2025}}</ref>

== Production ==
=== Development ===
On March 30, 2025, during the {{AMCM|green carpet}} premiere of {{AMCM}}, [[Jared Hess]] expressed interest in the idea of making a sequel, noting the world's use of infinite [[mods]], [[characters]], and [[biomes]], outlining how Minecraft is virtually endless.<ref>{{tweet|Variety|1906351446829768808|Would #AMinecraftMovie director Jared Hess make a sequel?<br><br>‚ÄúYes! It would be so much fun to go back into this world and go on another crazy adventure."<br>variety.com/2025/film/global/jack-black-hosting-snl-20-years-night-terrors-1236352004/|March 30, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.gamesradar.com/entertainment/adventure-movies/a-minecraft-movie-director-jared-hess-says-hes-interested-in-making-a-sequel-there-are-so-many-amazing-mods-and-characters-and-biomes-we-havent-explored-yet|title=A Minecraft Movie director Jared Hess says he‚Äôs interested in making a sequel: "There are so many amazing mods and characters and biomes we haven't explored yet"|website=gamesradar.com|date=April 4, 2025}}</ref> He later stated that there were many ideas they had for the film that they were unable to use, but would likely be included as part of a sequel.<ref name=deadline>{{cite web|url=https://deadline.com/2025/04/minecraft-movie-sequel-plans-director-jared-hess-jack-black-jason-momoa-1236362421/|title="'A Minecraft Movie's Jared Hess Talks Sequel, The Man Crush Between Jack Black And Jason Momoa & Hitting Zeitgeist Gold Decades After 'Napoleon Dynamite'"|website=deadline.com|date=April 7, 2025}}</ref>

On April 8, 2025, Jared Hess said that there were talks about a sequel in development.<ref>{{citation|url=https://gamefragger.com/multiplatform/massively-multiplayer/minecraft/a-minecraft-movie-sequel-already-in-talks-after-record-breaking-box-office-opening-a27168|title=A MINECRAFT MOVIE Sequel Already In Talks After Record-Breaking Box Office Opening|website=Game Fragger|date=April 13, 2025}}</ref> On April 11, 2025, it was reported by several outlets that a sequel was in early development.<ref name=":Comic" /> A day later, the CEO of Warner Bros. confirmed that there would be a follow-up film.<ref>{{citation|url=https://www.pcgamer.com/movies-tv/warner-bros-suits-confirm-a-minecraft-movie-will-be-getting-a-sequel-the-ink-might-not-be-dry-but-imminently/|title=Warner Bros suits confirm A Minecraft Movie will be getting a sequel: 'The ink might not be dry‚Ä¶ but imminently'|section=|website=Pcgamer.com|author=Rich Stanton|date=April 14, 2025|quote="It was a complete win for everyone involved."|archive-url=}}</ref> At the end of an interview released by The Art of VFX in May 2025 discussing the film, the VFX supervisor Sheldon Stopsack and the animation supervisor Kevin Estey both refer to a hypothetical sequel as "Another Minecraft Movie."<ref name=sequelname/>

On October 9, 2025, the official ''A Minecraft Movie'' Twitter account posted a teaser announcing that a sequel was set to release on July 23, 2027.<ref>{{tweet|AMinecraftMovie|1976341544266498142|Building terrain. See you in theaters July 23 2027. #Minecraft|October 9, 2025}}</ref> That same day, it was reported that Jared Hess would return to direct, while also writing the script alongside Chris Galletta. Cale Boyter, Roy Lee, Jason Momoa, Torfi Frans Olafsson, and Mary Parent are set to return as producers alongside Eric McLeod and Kayleen Walters.<ref name="AMCM2"/>

=== Casting ===
On April 2, 2025, [[Jack Black]] and [[Jason Momoa]] were asked many questions in a Q&A for the film. Black was asked if he would be playing [[Herobrine]] in a sequel. His response was "Dude, you want to know if there‚Äôs Hero Brian in the sequel? We don‚Äôt know. We don't know... I hope so."<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.abc4.com/dailydish/see-it-or-skip-it/exclusive-jack-black-jason-momoa-answer-questions-from-utah-kids-ahead-of-a-minecraft-movie/|title=EXCLUSIVE: Jack Black & Jason Momoa answer questions from Utah kids ahead of ‚ÄòA Minecraft Movie‚Äô|website=abc4.com|date=April 2, 2025}}</ref>

On April 4, 2025, [[Emma Myers]] and [[Sebastian Hansen]] told Yahoo UK how likely they thought a sequel would be. Emma said that she would love to do as many as they want, saying "Oh yeah, please. Minecraft 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 ‚Äî as many as they'll have me in I would love to do!" Sebastian revealed that it would be  be "great [to] keep it going" but also is unsure how it could go about because of the way in which the movie tells a story entirely new to the world of the game so that means a potential sequel could go anywhere and do anything, which is an overwhelming concept.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://uk.movies.yahoo.com/movies/will-be-minecraft-movie-2-cast-sequel-interview-095306480.html|title=Will there be A Minecraft Movie 2? Cast share how likely a sequel will be|website=yahoo.com|date=April 4, 2025}}</ref>

=== Filming ===
Filming is slated to begin in late April 2026.<ref>{{citation|url=https://deadline.com/2026/01/jason-momoa-minecraft-sequel-update-1236685775/|title=Jason Momoa Gives ‚ÄòMinecraft‚Äô Sequel Update: ‚ÄúVery Soon‚Äù|author=Glenn Garner|website=Deadline Hollywood|date=January 16, 2026}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|FallonTonight|2012025647401746937|Jason Momoa teases what‚Äôs in store for @AMinecraftMovie 2 üëÄ #FallonTonight|January 15, 2026}} "Very soon. Bro, end of April. They're in it. The script is ... better. Its so good, I was laughing out loud. I haven't laughed out loud in a very long time with a script. I was perplexed on the first script; this one's {{sic}} I'm laughing out loud."</ref>

== Release ==
The film is being distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures and is currently slated to be theatrically released in North America on July 23, 2027.<ref name="AMCM2"/>
